Activity: Log in to the project management software (e.g., Jira, Asana) and review any overnight notifications or urgent messages.
Check email for any urgent requests or information from team leads. Respond to any immediate concerns.
Meet with @ldes-1 (Lead Game Designer) to gather detailed information on game design tasks, dependencies, and deadlines. Discuss the overall game vision and ensure alignment with the project goals.
Meet with @lpro-1 (Lead Programmer) to gather detailed information on programming tasks, dependencies, and deadlines. Discuss the technology stack and any potential challenges.
Meet with @3dmod-1 and @3dmod-2 (3D Modeler/Animator) to gather detailed information on asset creation, animation tasks, dependencies, and deadlines. Review the art style and ensure consistency.

Meet with @aud-1 (Audio Engineer) to gather detailed information on sound design, music composition, and implementation tasks, dependencies, and deadlines. Discuss the desired audio atmosphere for the game.
Meet with @lvdn-1 (Level Designer) to gather detailed information on level design tasks, dependencies, and deadlines. Review the level layouts and gameplay mechanics.
Meet with @uiux-1 (UI/UX Designer) to gather detailed information on UI/UX design tasks, dependencies, and deadlines. Review the user interface and user experience design.
Initial review of the information gathered from team leads. Begin drafting a preliminary project schedule.
Address any outstanding emails or urgent requests. Prepare for tomorrow's meetings.
